scripts.dev: concurrently --names "MARKETING,DASHBOARD,API" "npm run dev:marketing" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:marketing && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:api
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:shared && npm run build:ui && npm run build:database
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install && cd ../database && npm install && cd ../../apps/marketing && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:marketing && npm run lint:dashboard
scripts.start: concurrently --names "MARKETING,DASHBOARD,API" "npm run start:marketing" "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:api"
